About.Officer in charge: Archivist - Joanne Horsley; Honorary Archivist - Alfred B. Mellor

About.Hours & facilities: Open Wed & Fri including school holidays and by appointment. General reference assistance and copying services available.

About.Acquisition focus: The history and heritage of Carey Baptist Grammar School.

About.Major holdings: The School Archives is in-house and geared to documenting and preserving school records from Carey's Foundation Day, 13 February, 1923. The archives accepts significant private papers and memorabilia from past students and staff.
